tool_description: Connects to various payment gateways and processors to execute payment transactions, handling different protocols and response formats across multiple providers.

gateway_provider.description: Payment gateway provider (stripe, square, paypal, braintree, authorize_net, adyen)

transaction_amount.description: Transaction amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents)

currency_code.description: ISO 4217 currency code (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)

payment_token.description: Secure payment token from tokenization process

merchant_id.description: Merchant identifier for the payment gateway

transaction_type.description: Type of transaction (authorize, capture, sale, void, refund)

retry_attempts.description: Number of retry attempts for failed transactions

metadata.description: Additional transaction metadata as key-value pairs

error_messages: Unsupported gateway provider: Use one of [stripe, square, paypal, braintree, authorize_net, adyen].
Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be greater than 0 and properly formatted.
Invalid currency code: Must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code.
Payment token expired: Generate a new payment token and retry.
Gateway connection failed: Check network connectivity and gateway status.
Transaction declined: Payment was declined by the gateway or issuing bank.
Invalid transaction type: Use one of [authorize, capture, sale, void, refund].
Timeout error: Gateway response exceeded the specified timeout period.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests to the gateway, implement backoff strategy.
usage: Provide gateway_provider, transaction_amount, currency_code, payment_token, merchant_id, and transaction_type. Optionally specify customer_id, gateway_timeout, retry_attempts, and metadata. Returns transaction results and gateway response details.

transaction_id.description: Unique transaction identifier from the gateway

transaction_status.description: Status of the transaction (approved, declined, pending, error)

gateway_response_code.description: Response code from the payment gateway

gateway_message.description: Response message from the payment gateway

processing_fee.description: Processing fee charged by the gateway

settled_amount.description: Final amount after fees and processing
